name: Zombie Shooter (itch) (RajanAbishai)
description:
Choose between two characters ( Tommy and Mary) to battle five different types of Zombies over four different missions.

Zombies: 

Little Zombie - Looks almost human. 

Light Zombie - Wrapped in bandages. 

Gun Zombie - Carries a gun but does not use it. 

Big Zombie - The big zombie is the precursor to the boss zombie. 

Boss Zombie - The biggest and meanest looking of them all. It has twice the amount of HP as the other zombies.

Missions:
-----------

Mission 1: Kill zombies 
-----------------------

Kill 50 Zombies to win

Mission 2: Reach Goal
-----------------------

Walk 40 steps to reach your goal,

Mission 3: Defend Fence 
-----------------------

Defend the fence for 100 seconds (timer provided). If the zombies break even a part of the fence, you lose.

Mission 4:  Survive 
-----------------------
A massive horde of Zombies has been unleashed into the city. Survive (for 200 seconds) till back up arrives

Controls:

W or Up Arrow- > Move up
S or Down Arrow -> Move Down
A or Left Arrow -> Move Left
D or Right Arrow -> Move Right

Change Weapon -> Q

Fire -> L
